nodes.text: The meditation ledge was one of the higher ledges located outside the First Jedi Temple on the Temple Island of Ahch-To, where so many Jedi had meditated over the eons.

The Lanais' songs recalled that some outsiders had leaped from this peak and gave their bodies to the waves, and others surrendered themselves and became shadows, dispersing into the light and darkness from which all had been created.
